name: Krampus is Home (itch)
description:
_______________________________________

KRAMPUS IS HOME is a survival horror experience. Sebastian is a teenager who is alone in his house waiting for his parents to come back. soon he realizes that there is something evil lurking around.

KEY FEATURES

- First person shooter.

- Complex and challenging survival strategies.

- Cinematic visuals.

- Story-driven game play.

- Advanced AI.

- Jump scares.

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

- Operating System: Windows 7, 8, 10.

- Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core.

- System Type: 64-bit Operating System.

- Memory: 4 GB RAM.

- Graphics Card: Nvidia GeForce 610M or equivalent.

- Storage: 3 GB available space.

KRAMPUS IS HOME_0.9.54

- Better gameplay flow.
- Many aesthetic changes in the environments.
- Doors open both ways.
- Improved performance in general.
- Chinese language now supported.
- Many bugs fixed.

More of the story will be revealed in the next update, so stay tuned!

Please tell us what you think of the game so far, it would help us improve the game before the final release.

Thank you!
